85265.markdown:
kubeadm: reset raises warnings if it cannot delete folders ([#85265](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/85265), [@SataQiu](https://github.com/SataQiu))

85368.text: Fix bug where EndpointSlice controller would attempt to modify shared objects.
85368.markdown: Fix bug where EndpointSlice controller would attempt to modify shared objects. ([#85368](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/85368), [@robscott](https://github.com/robscott))
85368.author: robscott

85408.text: Use context to check client closed instead of http.CloseNotifier in processing watch request which will reduce 1 goroutine for each request if proto is HTTP/2.x .
85408.markdown: Use context to check client closed instead of http.CloseNotifier in processing watch request which will reduce 1 goroutine for each request if proto is HTTP/2.x . ([#85408](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/85408), [@answer1991](https://github.com/answer1991))
85408.author: answer1991

85444.text: kube-apiserver: Fixes a bug that hidden metrics can not be enabled by the command-line option `--show-hidden-metrics-for-version`.
85444.markdown: kube-apiserver: Fixes a bug that hidden metrics can not be enabled by the command-line option `--show-hidden-metrics-for-version`. ([#85444](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/85444), [@RainbowMango](https://github.com/RainbowMango))
85444.author: RainbowMango

85490.text:
kubectl set resources will no longer return an error if passed an empty change for a resource. 
kubectl set subject will no longer return an error if passed an empty change for a resource.
85490.markdown:
kubectl set resources will no longer return an error if passed an empty change for a resource. 
  kubectl set subject will no longer return an error if passed an empty change for a resource. ([#85490](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/85490), [@sallyom](https://github.com/sallyom))
85490.author: sallyom

85516.text: kube-apiserver: fixed a conflict error encountered attempting to delete a pod with gracePeriodSeconds=0 and a resourceVersion precondition
85516.markdown: kube-apiserver: fixed a conflict error encountered attempting to delete a pod with gracePeriodSeconds=0 and a resourceVersion precondition ([#85516](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/85516), [@michaelgugino](https://github.com/michaelgugino))
85516.author: michaelgugino

85527.text: Revert ensure the KUBE-MARK-DROP chain in kube-proxy mode=iptables. Fix a bug in which kube-proxy deletes the rules associated with the chain in iptables mode.
85527.markdown: Revert ensure the KUBE-MARK-DROP chain in kube-proxy mode=iptables. Fix a bug in which kube-proxy deletes the rules associated with the chain in iptables mode. ([#85527](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/85527), [@aojea](https://github.com/aojea))
85527.author: aojea

85603.text: kubeadm: make sure images are pre-pulled even if a tag did not change but their contents changed
85603.markdown: kubeadm: make sure images are pre-pulled even if a tag did not change but their contents changed ([#85603](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/85603), [@bart0sh](https://github.com/bart0sh))
85603.author: bart0sh

85609.text: kubeadm now supports automatic calculations of dual-stack node cidr masks to kube-controller-manager.
85609.markdown:
kubeadm now supports automatic calculations of dual-stack node cidr masks to kube-controller-manager. ([#85609](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/85609), [@Arvinderpal](https://github.com/Arvinderpal))

  Courtesy of SIG Cluster Lifecycle
85609.author: Arvinderpal

85675.text: Fixed "requested device X but found Y" attach error on AWS.
85675.markdown: Fixed "requested device X but found Y" attach error on AWS. ([#85675](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/85675), [@jsafrane](https://github.com/jsafrane))
85675.author: jsafrane

85722.text: Filter published OpenAPI schema by making nullable, required fields non-required in order to avoid kubectl to wrongly reject null values.
85722.markdown: Filter published OpenAPI schema by making nullable, required fields non-required in order to avoid kubectl to wrongly reject null values. ([#85722](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/85722), [@sttts](https://github.com/sttts))
85722.author: sttts

85745.text: kubeadm: uses the apiserver AdvertiseAddress IP family to choose the etcd endpoint IP family for non external etcd clusters
85745.markdown: kubeadm: uses the apiserver AdvertiseAddress IP family to choose the etcd endpoint IP family for non external etcd clusters ([#85745](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/85745), [@aojea](https://github.com/aojea))
85745.author: aojea

85763.text: kubeadm: retry `kubeadm-config` ConfigMap creation or mutation if the apiserver is not responding. This will improve resiliency when joining new control plane nodes.
85763.markdown: kubeadm: retry `kubeadm-config` ConfigMap creation or mutation if the apiserver is not responding. This will improve resiliency when joining new control plane nodes. ([#85763](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/85763), [@ereslibre](https://github.com/ereslibre))
85763.author: ereslibre

85810.author: liggitt
